iceCream.print: You: Sorry, do you speak English?
???: I’d like a basic room please.
You: Alright, can I get your name?
You: And how many days will you be staying with us?
Tiffany: Tiffany. I’ll be staying for a week.
Tiffany: Actually, I was eating some ice cream earlier...
Tiffany: And I was wondering if you’d like to eat some with me... in my room?

iceCream_yes.print: Tiffany: So... do you like anime?
You: Unfortunately I'm not an avid fan.
You: But I have seen a few.
You: The one about that curious girl?
I relate to the main character’s way of living.
You: ... Okay, I should probably head back to the front desk.
Tiffany: I had a great time ;)

iceCream_no.print: Tiffany: You can... still come to room... if you want.

room.print: You: Hi, would you like any shampoo?
You: Also, how was your stay last night?

room_yes.print: Tiffany: Sure, and it was great! I have more ice cream, if you want. ;)
Tiffany: Anyways, I really like you. I hope you don’t disappear!

pillows.print: You: How was your stay last night?
Tiffany: But I’ve noticed that one of the guests have disappeared...
Tiffany: Can I have more pillows please, my friends are going to end up sleeping on the floor...
You: Wait, you didn’t answer my question.
Tiffany: I’m waiting for a pillow.

pillows_no.print: Tiffany: I guess you need to survive too.

toaster.print: You: Hey. What can I do for you today?
Tiffany: Recently I feel like there’s been no FUN!
You: What do you mean by that?
Tiffany: Oh, you surely know what I mean.

toaster_yes.print: Tiffany: How’re you enjoying your toaster?

toaster_no.print: Tiffany: You should have bought that toaster earlier.

toaster2.print: Tiffany: I can already smell the bread.
You: Wait, how old are you?
Tiffany: The important thing is that I still LOVE this hotel.
Tiffany: Anyways, I just wanted to say hi :3

toiletPaper.print: Tiffany: What was up with the last customer?
You: Not much, though I’m not really allowed to say much to you.
Tiffany: How did the shipment go?
Tiffany: Okay, it just seemed weird since Aleksandra was so worried about it.
